channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 13:38 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 🟢 13:38 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
